    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584

        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 626x18
          text run at (0,0) width 626: "Success! The width of the fixed table is 1994px, which is based on the width of its containing div."
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0

    LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 2000x30 [bgcolor=#0000FF]
